channel.title: Comic Archives on My Comic
channel.description: Recent content in Comic Archives on My Comic

item.title: UFO
item.description: It’s either this or all aliens are introverts.
item.content:encoded: It’s either this or all aliens are introverts.

item.title: Crossfit
item.description: I started doing exercise classes recently, so it’s on my brain. It’s the first time I’ve ever done a class and it’s kicking my butt. I’m coming up on 40 soon, so I have to do some damage control if I want to keep up with my kids, and… oh damn, I’m doing it, aren’t I?
item.content:encoded: I started doing exercise classes recently, so it’s on my brain. It’s the first time I’ve ever done a class and it’s kicking my butt. I’m coming up on 40 soon, so I have to do some damage control if I want to keep up with my kids, and… oh damn, I’m doing it, aren’t I?

item.title: Occult Detective Billy
item.description: I always liked the idea of a hard-boiled occult detective story crossed with the adventures of Tintin or The Hardy Boys. “Aw shucks” and unspeakable horrors.
item.content:encoded: I always liked the idea of a hard-boiled occult detective story crossed with the adventures of Tintin or The Hardy Boys. “Aw shucks” and unspeakable horrors.

item.title: Adamantium
item.description: This joke was pretty much entirely written by my wife. I don’t really follow pop music, so I wasn’t familiar with the Dave Guetta/Sia song, but the scenario worked for me. Check out the video if you want to hear what Wolvie is rocking out to, and watch what’s basically a mini X-men video.
item.content:encoded: This joke was pretty much entirely written by my wife. I don’t really follow pop music, so I wasn’t familiar with the Dave Guetta/Sia song, but the scenario worked for me. Check out the video if you want to hear what Wolvie is rocking out to, and watch what’s basically a mini X-men video.

item.title: Secret Treasure
item.description: Confession time: I worked for Cutco for a summer in college, and it was absolutely soul-crushing. I still have the knives, though. They’re actually pretty nice, which is how they get you.
item.content:encoded: Confession time: I worked for Cutco for a summer in college, and it was absolutely soul-crushing. I still have the knives, though. They’re actually pretty nice, which is how they get you.
